## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b069b475056c2219d8f5f62b9e0479ba4dfb9a18639f9afd674c9ef90359882d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pylint-sys' @ 8.15.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
